content.rendered:
THE HOLDEN COLORADO MY17 3D EVOLUTION FRONT REPLACEMENT WINCH BAR IS HERE!

The new and exciting Evolution front replacement winch bar is available for pre order now. These new bars give your vehicle an aggressive 4wd look without looking like a truck. They are a tough 3 and 5mm all steel construction and protect all of your engine vitals. They also give you full winch compatibility, 2 snatch rated recovery points, great angle of approach, and a heavy duty bash plate.

-The 3D Evolution Bumper is finished in a hard-wearing Powder coat and available standard in a flat slightly textured powdercoat black. It is a 3mm steel construction and includes as standard a 5mm Aluminium bash plate not offered on other brands. The middle winch cover comes standard in Black and can be optioned as stainless steel. We also offer as standard, LED foglights which are an option on many other brands.

-The Evolution bumper has carried out many dynamic crash tests here in Australia to ensure it complements the existing safety systems for example Air bags.

Includes:

Standard with Winch mount. no additional parts required to mount a winch.

Integrated LED Foglights as standard

5mm Aluminium Bash / Protection plate as standard

2 x Vehicle recovery points as standard

Front Parking Sensor Holes – We can provide blanketing plugs for vehicles that don’t require sensors.

Optional:

Can be colour coded to your vehicle specification

Middle winch cover can be optioned as stainless steel

Shackles

Winch

Light mounting bar

Spotlights

excerpt.rendered:
RHINO BAR SUIT HOLDEN COLORADO 2017+

Please note: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order.
